about_the_game:
Demo version of Darkness Reborn game- a medival fantasy RPG that includes swords, magic, potions and magic, as every medival fantasy RPG should. The main's game story is rather short. It consists of a fragment of life of a Dark Wizard named Sevarog. This ruthless rising Dark Lord's goal is to restore the power of his house, draining all life on its way. There is no limit, when it comes to grinding for his power.

Since this is a demo version, most of side quests and especially main story are disabled. You cannot progess in them You are however free to wandet the beautiful sights of Village of Light in every quality setting avaliable in the Release version.
Your base skills are enabled, you are even granted a few skill points to familiarize yourself with Skiil Tree system in this game. Of course, that means combat system is at your disposal, only decreased to enemies you would normally find in Release version- with exception to ones belonging to main story.
Game saves are diasbled in demo version.
Demo version still supports full sound of Release verion of the game.

We sincerely hope that this DEMO will convince you to try out full verion of the game, but even if not, your feedback always will be appreciated.

Enjoy!

Please note, that aswell as Release verion, game does not check out of bounds areas.
detailed_description:
Demo version of Darkness Reborn game- a medival fantasy RPG that includes swords, magic, potions and magic, as every medival fantasy RPG should. The main's game story is rather short. It consists of a fragment of life of a Dark Wizard named Sevarog. This ruthless rising Dark Lord's goal is to restore the power of his house, draining all life on its way. There is no limit, when it comes to grinding for his power.

Since this is a demo version, most of side quests and especially main story are disabled. You cannot progess in them You are however free to wandet the beautiful sights of Village of Light in every quality setting avaliable in the Release version.
Your base skills are enabled, you are even granted a few skill points to familiarize yourself with Skiil Tree system in this game. Of course, that means combat system is at your disposal, only decreased to enemies you would normally find in Release version- with exception to ones belonging to main story.
Game saves are diasbled in demo version.
Demo version still supports full sound of Release verion of the game.

We sincerely hope that this DEMO will convince you to try out full verion of the game, but even if not, your feedback always will be appreciated.

Enjoy!

Please note, that aswell as Release verion, game does not check out of bounds areas.
legal_notice:
Dissmembling game is forbidden under Unreal Engine End User License Agreement.
Music is only licensed for the game, meaning any reviews on youtube containing it might get flagged.
Un-authorized redistribution is prohibited.
name: Darkness Reborn Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 7th gen/ AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 10th gen/ AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Audigy FX
  • Additional Notes: Please note that this game graphics on settings starting from HIgh is very demanding, that's why it needs so powerful setup

short_description: Demo version of Darkness Reborn game- a short, medival fantasy RPG.
